summary: The package provides a complete example of using a Relational Graph Convolutional Network (RGCN) with MXNet and DGL to perform entity classification on multi‑relational graph datasets. It includes a Gluon‑based RGCN model definition with configurable layers and basis decomposition, as well as a script that loads benchmark datasets, builds the model, runs a training loop with L2 regularization, and reports classification accuracy.
business_intent: Showcase how to implement and evaluate RGCN‑based entity classification in a production‑ready MXNet environment, offering a reference implementation for developers and researchers building graph neural network solutions for knowledge‑graph tasks.
